releaseNotes:
Fixed:
order of recent grades in subject detailed
empty line of cabinet of lesson in schedule screen
now fixed width of subject column in report card screen
now fixed width of subject column in grades
cabinet distinction on main screen, on schedule screen
status bar color on light theme glitch
color of weekline in schedule screen, also adjusted height of this line
removed year from dates in notifications
more intelligent new fetched task notification shortening

Added:
switcher to bad grades estimated(ruin of current / or lower bound)
grade avg predict
calculation of days left
calculation of lessons left
ability to go to subject details from lesson detailed in schedule screen ALSO swap EDIT DELETE buttons
ability to go to subject details from grade detailed
ability to create subject right from subject selection menu
Teachers screen ui improved

Fixed strange behaviour of report card, by adding subjects names from EduPerformances fetching.
Fixed ui theme.

DO NOT UPDATE if you have important information saved, it will be lost on update.

Fixed crash on empty task save.
Fixed new task notification title and on click callback.
Fixed subject add/edit text fields colors.

Fixed select button absence in task subject choice.
Fixed on subject create cabinet field as display name save.
Re-made subject names worker
Finally fixed task space instant trim

Fixed task's title/description instant trim.
Fixed subject's cabinet save as display name on creation
Fixed navigation drawer fixed height. Added scrolling to it.
